H0.text: The manufacture of what was prohibited in Russia between 1914-1925. Absinthe

H1.text: The manufacture of what was prohibited in Russia between 1914-1925. Cigarettes

H2.text: The manufacture of what was prohibited in Russia between 1914-1925. Opium

H3.text: The manufacture of what was prohibited in Russia between 1914-1925. Vodka

A4.text: Prohibition was introduced under the rule of Tsar Nicholas II in 1914, at the outset of World War I. It banned the sale of hard liquors, such as vodka, except in privileged establishments.
